learning_outcomes.description: Explain the requirement of different protection schemes for the proper operation of power system.
Recognise factors to be considered when designing a power system protection scheme.
Demonstrate the operation of various components used in power system protection.
Calculate protection settings when designing a protection scheme for a simple power system network and components.
Identify challenges and current developments in power system protection.

learning_activities.topic:
Lectures on various topics

Series of lectures covering fault analysis and various protection schemes used in the power systems. Some of the lectures will be covered by the industry experts. Following topics will be covered in this course : Fault analysis, symmetrical components, Relay operation, Different types of relays, Relay coordination, Unit protection, Instrument Transformers, IEC 61850 requirements, effect of renewables

Learning outcomes: L01, L02, L03, L04, L05
